name: androidui-webapp
description: Framework to make high-performance SPA/WebApp. Render with web canvas.
author: LinFaXin

scripts.build: npm install && npm run buildSrc && npm run buildSample
scripts.buildSrc: cd src && node build_sdk_res.js && "../buildtool/typescript/bin/tsc" -p ./ && node insert_sdk_version_dist.js && babel ../dist/android-ui.js -o ../dist/android-ui.es5.js -s --presets=es2015
scripts.buildSample: cd sample && node build_res.js sample.app ../../../dist/android-ui.d.ts && "../buildtool/typescript/bin/tsc" -p ./ && babel build/app.js -o build/app.es5.js -s --presets=es2015
